achievements.name: Fantastic Voyage: Prologue
achievements.desc: Complete "Fantastic Voyage" and unlock all endings.

achievements.name: Archaic Lord of Lightning and Blitz
achievements.desc: Witness the awesome meteorological power of Bennett's phenomenally bad luck.

achievements.name: The Power of Luck
achievements.desc: Activate the mechanisms and obtain the treasure without making any mistakes.

achievements.name: Evil Is Banished
achievements.desc: Complete "Signs of Evil" and unlock all endings.

achievements.name: Behold, Mine Evil-Espying Eye!
achievements.desc: Correctly interpret all clues.

achievements.name: Red Hot Chili Popsicles
achievements.desc: Make a popsicle using the wrong recipe and provoke Chongyun's Pure-Yang Spirit.

achievements.name: A Line That May Be Crossed
achievements.desc: Complete "Wellspring of Healing" and unlock all endings.

achievements.name: An Idol's Last Line of Defense
achievements.desc: Successfully persuade Albert and Barbara's other fans to leave.

achievements.name: Mondstadt's Spiciest Surprise
achievements.desc: Sample Barbara's Chilibrew.

achievements.name: A Maid of Strength and Virtue
achievements.desc: Complete "Chivalric Training" and unlock all endings.

achievements.name: "...For I Am Duty Bound"
achievements.desc: Help Noelle discover the source of her strength.

achievements.name: A World Known Only Unto Roses
achievements.desc: Read Noelle's study notes.

achievements.name: Stress Relief
achievements.desc: Complete "Knightly Exam Prep" and unlock all endings.

achievements.name: Invulnerable Maid-Knight
achievements.desc: Listen to "A Knight's Journey Through Liyue" with Noelle.

achievements.name: Mondstadt's Note-Taker General
achievements.desc: Read Noelle's study notes.

achievements.name: Diona Special, Stirred, Not Shaken
achievements.desc: Complete "The Cat and the Cocktail" and unlock all endings.

achievements.name: But There's a Catch...
achievements.desc: Help Diona find a special base drink.

achievements.name: Kitten Queen
achievements.desc: Bring all the cats back to The Cat's Tail.

achievements.name: Everyone's Happy
achievements.desc: Complete "A Housekeeper's Daily Chores" and unlock all endings.

achievements.name: Housekeeper Extraordinaire
achievements.desc: Complete the big cleanup within the time limit

achievements.name: From the Sea Never Returning
achievements.desc: Learn of Inu Shoushou's story together with Thoma

achievements.name: Taller by Half
achievements.desc: Complete "Yoohoo Art: Seichou no Jutsu" and unlock all endings.

achievements.name: Mujina-Class Ninja
achievements.desc: Obtain Sayu's highest rating during agility training.

achievements.name: Dish Effect: Mobility Decreased
achievements.desc: You were unable to prevent Sayu's reckless consumption...

achievements.name: General of Watatsumi
achievements.desc: Complete "The Canine General's Special Operations" and unlock all endings

achievements.name: Changing Times
achievements.desc: Draw all fortune slips at the Grand Narukami Shrine.

achievements.name: To Tell or Not to Tell, That Is the Question
achievements.desc: Discover Ms. Hina's true identity at the Yae Publishing House.

achievements.name: Honorary Crux Member
achievements.desc: Complete "When the Crux Shines Bright" and unlock all endings.

achievements.name: Wine Unburdens
achievements.desc: Take part in the Qingce banquet with Beidou

achievements.name: Guyun Buyers' Club
achievements.desc: Find out the truth behind the deal Beidou's making

achievements.name: Megrez's Companion Star
achievements.desc: Complete "The Jade Chamber's Returning Guest" and unlock all endings.

achievements.name: You've Got to Have Reserves
achievements.desc: Fish? The more the merrier, of course!

achievements.name: Overprotectiveness
achievements.desc: A single stone births a thousand ripples. It seems like Ningguang's day off is not to be.

achievements.name: The Lingering Song
achievements.desc: Complete "A Song That Knows Grace" and unlock all endings.

achievements.name: May This Moment Be Made to Last
achievements.desc: Take a commemorative photo with Yun Jin.

achievements.name: A Strict Master Trains a Talented Pupil
achievements.desc: Complete the practice session without hitting a single blue scarecrow.

achievements.name: Arataki Gang Chief Advisor
achievements.desc: Complete "The Gang's Daily Deeds" and unlock all endings.

achievements.name: One More Look!
achievements.desc: Gaze upon the glory that is Kuki Shinobu in a shrine maiden outfit.

achievements.name: "Upstairs..."
achievements.desc: Be dissuaded before alerting Kujou Sara and Kuki Shinobu.

achievements.name: You Thought We Were For Real, Eh?
achievements.desc: Complete "Trap 'Em by Storm" and unlock all endings.

achievements.name: An Ideal Detective Am I
achievements.desc: Correctly analyze the motives and the truth behind the crime the first time.

achievements.name: Sangonomiya Supplications
achievements.desc: Ask Gorou whether Kokomi knows about the happenings on Watatsumi Island.

achievements.name: Optimal Solution
achievements.desc: Complete "A Confounding Conundrum" and unlock all endings.

achievements.name: To You in a Hundred Years
achievements.desc: Read all the letters sent to Faruzan.

achievements.name: Mechanics: From Beginner to...?
achievements.desc: Guess correctly the smallest number of moves it will take to solve a seven-layer Pagoda Stack.

achievements.name: The Name Is Layla
achievements.desc: Complete "Ever Silent Stars" and unlock all endings.

achievements.name: She's Already Tense
achievements.desc: Help Layla finish her thesis without causing her further anxiety.

achievements.name: Secret of Seelie and the Star-Lit Sky
achievements.desc: Obtain the authentic letter of the Wisdom Seelie.

achievements.name: Art and Life
achievements.desc: Complete "The Pendulum of Weal and Woe" and unlock all endings.

achievements.name: School Days
achievements.desc: Find the annotated books in the House of Daena.

achievements.name: An Architect's Romanticism
achievements.desc: Chat about the future with Kaveh in the desert.

achievements.name: Make Merry
achievements.desc: Complete "Shenanigans and Sweet Wine" and unlock all endings.

achievements.name: Lucky Coin
achievements.desc: Participate in the wager set up by Kaeya.

achievements.name: Shh... Listen!
achievements.desc: Listen to the voice coming from the confinement room.

achievements.name: Indicators of Fate
achievements.desc: Complete "Checks & Cats" and unlock all endings.

achievements.name: Speedrun
achievements.desc: Persuade Lynette to spend a leisurely, peaceful day with you.

achievements.name: Decks & Detectives
achievements.desc: Have a peaceful tea party with Lynette after solving the smuggling case.
